properties.name: visible
properties.description: Whether stroke is visible or not.

properties.name: draw-arrows
properties.description: Whether arrows on line are drawn or not.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Whether polyline is draggable or not.

events.name: double-click
events.description: Raised when polyline is double clicked.

events.name: right-click
events.description: Raised when polyline is right clicked.

events.name: mouse-over
events.description: Raised when mouse moves over the polyline.

events.name: mouse-out
events.description: Raised when mouse moves out of the polyline.

events.name: mouse-down
events.description: Raised when mouse is pressed down on polyline.

events.name: mouse-up
events.description: Raised when mouse is released from polyline.
